page.title: 10Services in Woodhalls
page.content: Electricity,by overhead cable, supplies all properties, and in at least one case this is backed up by a portable generator in times of mains failure.Mains gas is not supplied to any of these properties, but in some cases cylinders of bottled gas are kept as an emergency reserve for lighting, heating and cooking.The water supply is mostly by submersible pumps from private wells except in two cases where mains water has been installed.The drainage from all properties relies on either septic tanks or cesspits. Doctors are available in Hatherleigh (2 miles) or Okehampton (5 miles).A cottage hospital is situated in Okehampton and the nearest general hospital is at Exeter (26m.) There are markets at both Hatherleigh and Okehampton.
